short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your day with a daily dose of inspiration in 11 languages and over 1,000,000 quotes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of words with our quotable extension. Whether you're seeking inspiration, motivation, or just a dose of positivity, we've got you covered. It offers a diverse collection of quotes from renowned leaders, writers, and thinkers, as well as personal and uplifting messages.

With a sleek and user-friendly interface, finding the perfect quote has never been easier. Start your day on a positive note with a quote that speaks to your soul and bring meaning to every moment.

It includes over 1,000,000 beautiful quotes in 11 different languages from around the world. Copy and share it with others easily with just a single click.
